title: Andrews, Clark, and Mares
description:
Zach goes around the standings: ESPN's Kendra Andrews discusses the Warriors offseason, Kevin Durant, and more; Kevin Clark of The Ringer talks all things Magic (32:52). Then Adam Mares of DNVR Sports breaks down the Nuggets ahead of a pivotal season (1:07:55). 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
